name: CAVE (ManuelQuintero)
description: Long story short, i made this game for another jam but the topic was "too long" so i made some sort of loop, i think is better for this jam so i changed and add different things, im not sure i understood the rules, thats why i couldnt add more sprites that i made using krita, its important to say that i didnt make the music or the player sprites, actually only the tree is mine and also the sign.
